name: Brother Bolha
description:
Take all your brothers, avoid the obstacles then reach your mom. You can do this?

Use arrow, WASD or Mouse to control the Bubble, you can change the controls in options menu.

This project narrowly won $250 in Kongregate's monthly August contest. Only 0.02 points left to be in 15th place. But I'm happy because I had a lot of feedbacks, and decided to post here.
